trans-unit.source: *Note that the HCA BM1 data contains ~50000 sequenced cells, requiring more than 60Gb of RAM (we recommend to use High Performance Computers). If you want to run our example on a regular PC or a laptop, you can use a randomly chosen number of cells:
trans-unit.target: *请注意，HCA BM1数据包含〜50000个排序的单元，需要超过60Gb的RAM（我们建议使用高性能计算机）。如果要在普通PC或笔记本电脑上运行我们的示例，则可以使用随机选择的单元格数量：

trans-unit.source: Human.MitoCarta2.0.csv: An csv spreadsheet with human mitochondrial genes, created within work MitoCarta2.0: an updated inventory of mammalian mitochondrial proteins Sarah E. Calvo, Karl R. Clauser, Vamsi K. Mootha, Nucleic Acids Research, Volume 44, Issue D1, 4 January 2016.
trans-unit.target: Human.MitoCarta2.0.csv ：在工作MitoCarta2.0中创建的带有人类线粒体基因的 csv 电子表格 ：哺乳动物线粒体蛋白的更新清单 Sarah E. Calvo，Karl R. Clauser，Vamsi K.Mootha，Nucleic Acids Research，第1卷2016年1月4日，第44期，D1。

trans-unit.source: Pandas DataFrame where axis 0 is genes and axis 1 are cells. If the are batched in the data then the index of axis 1 should have two levels, e.g. ('batch', 'cell'), with the first level indicating patient, batch or expreriment where that cell was sequenced, and the second level containing cell barcodes for identification.
trans-unit.target: Pandas DataFrame ，其中 axis 0 是基因， axis 1 是细胞。如果将批处理在数据中，则 axis 1 的索引应具有两个级别，例如 ('batch', 'cell') ，其中第一级指示患者，批处理或expreriment在该单元格的排序位置，第二级包含细胞条形码以进行识别。

trans-unit.source: Pandas Series where index should have two levels, e.g. ('cell', 'gene'). If there are batched in the data the first level should be indicating patient, batch or expreriment where that cell was sequenced, the second level cell barcodes for identification and the third level gene names.
trans-unit.target: Pandas Series ，其中索引应具有两个级别，例如 ('cell', 'gene') 。如果数据中有批次，则第一级应指示患者，批次或专家对该细胞进行测序的位置，用于识别的第二级细胞条形码和第三级基因名称。

trans-unit.source: getAnomalyScoresPlot(): plot with anomaly scores per cell
trans-unit.target: getAnomalyScoresPlot() ：每个单元具有异常分数的图

trans-unit.source: getIndividualGeneExpressionPlot(): 2D layout colored by individual gene's expression
trans-unit.target: getIndividualGeneExpressionPlot() ：由单个基因的表达着色的二维布局

trans-unit.source: getIndividualGeneTtestPlot(): Produce heatmap plot of t-test p-Values calculated gene-pair-wise from the annotated clusters
trans-unit.target: getIndividualGeneTtestPlot() ：生成从带注释的簇按基因对计算的t检验p值的热图图

trans-unit.source: makeHistogramNullDistributionPlot(): null distribution for each cluster and each cell type illustrating the "machinery" of the Digital Cell Sorter
trans-unit.target: makeHistogramNullDistributionPlot() ：每个集群和每个单元格类型的空分布，说明了数字单元格排序器的“机械”

trans-unit.source: makeMarkerExpressionPlot(): a heatmap that shows all markers and their expression levels in the clusters, in addition this figure contains relative (%) and absolute (cell counts) cluster sizes
trans-unit.target: makeMarkerExpressionPlot() ：一个热图，显示集群中的所有标记及其表达水平，此外该图还包含相对（％）和绝对（细胞计数）集群的大小

trans-unit.source: makePlotOfNewMarkers(): genes significantly expressed in the annotated cell types
trans-unit.target: makePlotOfNewMarkers() ：在带注释的细胞类型中显着表达的基因

trans-unit.source: makeProjectionPlot(): 2D layout colored by number of unique genes expressed, number of counts measured, and a faraction of mitochondrial genes..
trans-unit.target: makeProjectionPlot() ：2D布局，根据表示的独特基因数，所测量的计数数和线粒体基因的功能着色。

trans-unit.source: makeSankeyDiagram(): river plot to compare various results
makeStackedBarplot(): plot with fractions of various cell types
trans-unit.target: makeStackedBarplot() ：使用各种单元格类型的分数进行绘图

trans-unit.source: makeVotingResultsMatrixPlot(): z-scores of the voting results for each input cell type and each cluster, in addition this figure contains relative (%) and absolute (cell counts) cluster sizes
trans-unit.target: makeVotingResultsMatrixPlot() ：每种输入像元类型和每个簇的投票结果的z分数，此外此图还包含相对（％）和绝对（像元数）簇的大小

trans-unit.source: markersDCS.xlsx: An excel book with marker data. Rows are markers and columns are cell types. '1' means that the gene is a marker for that cell type, '-1' means that this gene is not expressed in this cell type, and '0' otherwise. This gene marker file included in the package is used by Default. If you use your own file it has to be prepared in the same format (including the two-line header). Note that only the first worksheet will be read, and its name can be arbitrary. The first column should contain gene names. The second row should contain cell types, and the first row how those cell types are grouped. If any of the cell types need to be skipped, have "NA" in the corresponding cell of the first row of that cell type.
trans-unit.target: markersDCS.xlsx ：具有标记数据的excel书籍。行是标记，列是单元格类型。 “ 1”表示该基因是该细胞类型的标记，“-1”表示该基因在该细胞类型中不表达，否则为“ 0”。包中包含的此基因标记文件默认情况下使用。如果使用自己的文件，则必须以相同的格式（包括两行标题）准备文件。请注意，仅将读取第一个工作表，并且其名称可以是任意的。第一列应包含基因名称。第二行应包含单元格类型，第一行应包含这些单元格类型的分组方式。如果需要跳过任何一种单元格类型，请在该单元格类型第一行的相应单元格中使用“ NA”。

trans-unit.source: orca is necessary to convert Sankey diagrams to static images. If for any reason orca is unavailable the Sankey diagrams will be saved as ineractive HTML figure, that can be opened in a browser (Chrome, Firefox etc.) and saved as static image. The visualization of DigitalCellSorter are implemented with matplotlib, allowing all the figures to be saved in either raster or vactor format. Since plotly can convert simple matplotlib figures (scatter, line, bar plots, but not heatmaps, splines or other complex patch objects) to ineractive HTML format DigitalCellSorter can attempt to save any of its figures as HTML. This is particulatly useful with Projection plots, even though the color bars are not rendered in HTML figures.
trans-unit.target: orca 是将Sankey图转换为静态图像所必需的。如果由于某种原因无法使用 orca ,则Sankey图将另存为无效HTML图，可以在浏览器（Chrome，Firefox等）中打开并保存为静态图像。 DigitalCellSorter 的可视化是通过 matplotlib 实现的，从而允许将所有图形保存为栅格或vactor格式。由于 plotly 可以将简单的 matplotlib 图形（散点图，折线图，条形图，但不能转换为热图，样条线或其他复杂的补丁对象）转换为无效的HTML格式，因此 DigitalCellSorter 可以尝试将其任何图形另存为HTML。这对于 Projection 特别有用 绘制，即使未在HTML图形中呈现颜色条。

trans-unit.source: Note: We are currently preparing a manuscript describing the toolkit located this repository. If you want to access the package detailed in our latest publication of Polled Digital Cell Sorter go to https://zenodo.org/record/2603265 and download the package (v1.1).
trans-unit.target: 注意：我们目前正在准备一个手稿，描述位于此存储库中的工具箱。如果要访问我们最新发布的《轮询数字细胞分选仪》中详细介绍的软件包，请访问https://zenodo.org/record/2603265并下载该软件包（v1.1）。

trans-unit.source: The latest publication describing the methodology of cell types identification:Polled Digital Cell Sorter (p-DCS): Automatic identification of hematological cell types from single cell RNA-sequencing clusters Sergii Domanskyi, Anthony Szedlak, Nathaniel T Hawkins, Jiayin Wang, Giovanni Paternostro & Carlo Piermarocchi, BMC Bioinformatics volume 20, Article number: 369 (2019)
trans-unit.target: 描述细胞类型识别方法的最新出版物：轮询数字细胞分选仪（p-DCS）：从单细胞RNA测序簇中自动识别血液细胞类型 Sergii Domanskyi，Anthony Szedlak，Nathaniel T Hawkins，Jiayin Wang，Giovanni Paternostro和Carlo Piermarocchi， BMC生物信息学第20卷，货号：369（2019）

trans-unit.source: All the output files are saved in output directory inside the directory where the demo.py script is. If you specify any other directory, the results will be generetaed in it. If you do not provide any directory the results will appear in the root where the script was executed.
trans-unit.target: 所有输出文件都保存在 demo.py 脚本所在目录内的 output 目录中。如果指定任何其他目录，将在其中生成结果。如果不提供任何目录，结果将显示在执行脚本的根目录中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can clone and install this module directly from GitHub using:
trans-unit.target: 另外,你也可以直接在GitHub上使用以下方法克隆并安装这个模块。

trans-unit.target: 计算并绘制任意单元格类型或簇的异常得分。

trans-unit.source: Digital Cell Sorter (DCS): a single cell RNA-seq analysis toolkit for clustering, cell type identification, and anomaly detection.
trans-unit.target: Digital Cell Sorter(DCS):单细胞RNA-seq分析工具包,用于聚类、细胞类型识别和异常检测。

trans-unit.source: During the initialization a number of parameters can be specified. For detailed list see documentation. Many of these parameters are transfered to DCS attributes thus can be modified after initialization using, e.g.:
trans-unit.target: 在初始化过程中,可以指定一些参数。详细列表见文档。其中许多参数被转移到DCS属性中,因此可以在初始化后使用以下方法进行修改,例如:

trans-unit.source: Effect of batch correction demostrated on combining BM1, BM2, BM3 and processing the data jointly without (left) and with (right) batch correction option:
trans-unit.target: 分批修正的效果演示了BM1、BM2、BM3的组合,以及在没有(左)和有(右)批量修正选项的情况下联合处理数据的效果。

trans-unit.source: For a quick-start demo with a dataset of ~5k PBMCs execute in the terminal and follow prompts:
trans-unit.target: 对于一个快速启动的演示与〜5k PBMCs的数据集在终端执行,并按照提示。

trans-unit.source: Function visualize() will produce most of the necessary files for post-analysis of the data.
trans-unit.target: 函数 visualize() 将产生大多数必要的文件，用于数据的后期分析。

trans-unit.source: In the demo, folder data is intentionally left empty. The data file (cc95ff89-2e68-4a08-a234-480eca21ce79.homo_sapiens.mtx.zip) is about 2.4Gb in size and will be downloaded with the demo.py script.
trans-unit.target: 在演示中，文件夹 data 有意留为空白。数据文件（cc95ff89-2e68-4a08-a234-480eca21ce79.homo_sapiens.mtx.zip）大小约为2.4Gb，将与 demo.py 脚本一起下载。

trans-unit.source: Install DigitalCellSorter with pip. Most of the dependencies packages are automatically installed with installation of the latest release of DigitalCellSorter:
trans-unit.target: 使用 pip 安装 DigitalCellSorter 。大多数依赖项软件包会随最新版本的 DigitalCellSorter 的安装自动安装：

trans-unit.source: It is highly recommended to install Anaconda. Installers are available at https://www.anaconda.com/distribution/ Whether you already had Anaconda installed or just installed it we recommend to update all packages by running:

trans-unit.source: Note, if neither fitsne, umap nor phate are installed DigitalCellSorter defaults to PCA two largest principal components for visualization layout.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果既未安装 fitsne ，又未安装 umap 或 phate ,则 DigitalCellSorter 默认为PCA两个用于可视化布局的主要组件。

trans-unit.source: Note: use of conda environments (for instance DCS exemplified above) with a high performance computer such as MSU HPCC in a batch job, i.e. not on a development node but submitted to a SLURM queue, requires the following steps. In the slurm script, before line calling your python script, add conda deactivate to deactivate base environnment and conda activate DCS. After calling the script do conda deactivate. The example testing script is shown below.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在批处理作业中（例如不在开发节点上但已提交到SLURM队列中）将Conda环境（例如，上面示例的DCS）与MSU HPCC等高性能计算机一起使用时，需要执行以下步骤。在Slurm脚本中，在调用python脚本的行之前，添加 conda deactivate 禁用基本环境， conda activate DCS 。调用脚本后，请执行 conda deactivate 。示例测试脚本如下所示。

trans-unit.source: Now, in your new environment, the packages can be installed or updated without affecting your other environments. Note, environments use is not necessary, and the default (base) is used if you dont set up any other. For more information see https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda/en/latest/user-guide/tasks/manage-environments.html
trans-unit.target: 现在，在新环境中，可以在不影响其他环境的情况下安装或更新软件包。请注意，不需要使用环境，并且如果您未设置任何其他设置，则使用默认值 (base) 。有关更多信息，请参见 https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda/en/latest/user-guide/tasks/manage-environments.html

trans-unit.source: On Windows the FI-tSNE wrapper and executable are already included with DigitalCellSorter.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上， DigitalCellSorter 已包含FI-tSNE包装器和可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: On macOS Mojave C++ compiler has to be specified explicitly:
trans-unit.target: 在macOS Mojave的C++编译器必须明确指定。

trans-unit.source: Our software uses packages numpy, pandas, matplotlib, scikit-learn, scipy, mygene, fftw, fitsne, adjustText and a few other standard Python packages. Some of the packages used in DigitalCellSorter are not installed by default, and should by installed by separately if using certain functionality with Digital Cell Sorter. For example, for network-based clustering install packages pynndescent, networkx, python-louvain. Other packages that have to be installed separately are fitsne, umap, phate and orca. The detailed instructions are below.
trans-unit.target: 我们的软件使用包 numpy 的， pandas ， matplotlib ， scikit-learn ， scipy ， mygene ， fftw ， fitsne ， adjustText 和其他一些标准的Python包。 DigitalCellSorter 中使用的某些软件包在默认情况下未安装，如果在Digital Cell Sorter中使用某些功能，则应单独安装。例如，对于基于网络的群集，请安装软件包 pynndescent ， networkx ， python-louvain 。其他需要单独安装的软件包为 fitsne ， umap ， phate 和 orca 。详细说明如下。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, one can create a local copy of this project for development purposes, and install the package from the cloned directory:
trans-unit.target: 类似地,人们可以为了开发目的而创建这个项目的本地副本,并从克隆的目录中安装该包。

trans-unit.source: Spreadsheet of comma-separated values csv containing condensed matrix in a form ('cell', 'gene', 'expr'). If there are batches in the data the matrix has to be of the form ('batch', 'cell', 'gene', 'expr'). Columns order can be arbitrary.
trans-unit.target: 逗号分隔值 csv 的电子表格，包含形式为 ('cell', 'gene', 'expr') 压缩矩阵。如果数据中有批次，则矩阵的形式必须为 ('batch', 'cell', 'gene', 'expr') 。列顺序可以是任意的。

trans-unit.source: Spreadsheet of comma-separated values csv where rows are genes, columns are cells with gene expression counts. If there are batches in the data the spreadsheet the first row should be 'batch' and the second 'cell'.
trans-unit.target: 逗号分隔值 csv 的电子表格，其中行是基因，列是具有基因表达计数的细胞。如果数据在电子表格中存在批次，则第一行应为 'batch' ，第二行应为 'cell' 。

trans-unit.source: To use Sankey diagrams that are part of Digital Cell Sorter install plotly and orca:
trans-unit.target: 要使用作为Digital Cell Sorter一部分的Sankey图，请安装 plotly 和 orca ：

trans-unit.source: Toolkit for analysis and identification of cell types from heterogeneous single cell RNA-seq data
trans-unit.target: 从异质单细胞RNA-seq数据中分析和识别细胞类型的工具包。

trans-unit.source: Use the latest release of PyPI package.
We have made an example execution file demo.py that shows how to use DigitalCellSorter.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经制作了一个示例执行文件 demo.py ，该示例显示了如何使用 DigitalCellSorter 。

trans-unit.source: With conda, you can create, export, list, remove, and update environments that have different versions of Python and/or packages installed in them. Switching or moving between environments is called activating the environment.
trans-unit.target: 使用 conda,您可以创建、导出、列出、删除和更新有不同版本 Python 和/或安装包的环境。在环境之间切换或移动叫做激活环境。

trans-unit.source: With datasets containing less than 2000 cells sklearn.manifold.TSNE is used. For large datasets Fast Fourier Transform-accelerated Interpolation-based t-SNE (FIt-SNE) implemented by KlugerLab is used (https://github.com/KlugerLab/FIt-SNE). To use FIt-SNE the following need to be installed. First update cython by
trans-unit.target: 对于包含少于2000个单元的数据集，使用 sklearn.manifold.TSNE 。对于大型数据集，使用了由KlugerLab实现的基于快速傅里叶变换的基于插值的t-SNE（FIt -SNE）（https://github.com/KlugerLab/FIt-SNE）。要使用FIt-SNE，需要安装以下内容。首先更新 cython ，方法是

trans-unit.source: from https://preview.data.humancellatlas.org/ (Raw Counts Matrix - Bone Marrow). That file was ~485Mb and containing 378000 cells from 8 bone marrow donors (BM1-BM8).
trans-unit.target: 来自https://preview.data.humancellatlas.org/（原始计数矩阵-骨髓）。该文件约为485Mb，包含来自8个骨髓供体（BM1-BM8）的378000个细胞。

trans-unit.source: where test.py is the python script where you import and use DigitalCellSorter.
trans-unit.target: 其中 test.py 是您导入和使用 DigitalCellSorter 的python脚本 。
